title: Text Generation

code: from transformers import pipeline text2text_generator = pipeline("text2text-generation") text2text_generator("question: What is 42 ? context: 42 is the answer to life, the universe and everything") [{'generated_text': 'the answer to life, the universe and everything'}] text2text_generator("translate from English to French: I'm very happy") [{'generated_text': 'Je suis tr√®s heureux'}]
